meanings.definition: The act of granting a license or permission to do something.
meanings.sent1: The licencing of the new software was completed smoothly.
meanings.sent2: She needed licencing to operate the vehicle legally.
meanings.sent3: The licencing process felt like a formality for such a simple task.
meanings.sent4: Obtaining the licencing was like unlocking a new level of opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The licencing requirements were clearly outlined for everyone to follow.

meanings.definition: The official document granting permission to do something.
meanings.sent1: He proudly displayed his licencing on the office wall.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to carry your licencing with you at all times.
meanings.sent3: The licencing paper seemed to have a mind of its own, always getting lost.
meanings.sent4: Her licencing was a golden ticket to explore new ventures.
meanings.sent5: The licencing document was signed and sealed for legal purposes.
